Name: Ball Twist
About the game: In this miniature clicker action game, you control a ball moving across a dynamically generated platform. Your task is to have time to turn the ball in order to make a turn at the corners of the platform and not fall down. Along the way, you need to collect tokens to increase your score. As you progress, the turns will appear more often and the speed of the ball will increase. Enjoy your game.
